statements: SELECT * FROM customer_interactions;
SELECT interaction_id, customer_id, interaction_time FROM customer_interactions;
SELECT interaction_type FROM customer_interactions WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_time BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT interaction_id, customer_id, interaction_type FROM customer_interactions ORDER BY interaction_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions ORDER BY interaction_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, interaction_data FROM customer_interactions WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY interaction_time ASC;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_time FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY interaction_time DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_time > '2022-01-01' AND interaction_data->>'product' = 'Shoes';
SELECT COUNT(interaction_id) AS total_interactions, AVG(customer_id) AS avg_customer_id FROM customer_interactions GROUP BY interaction_type HAVING COUNT(interaction_id) > 2;
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions;
SELECT user_id, page_visited FROM customer_interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, interaction_date FROM customer_interactions WHERE page_visited='Homepage';
SELECT user_id, theme_preference FROM user_preferences WHERE language_preference='English';
SELECT user_id, page_visited, interaction_date FROM customer_interactions ORDER BY interaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, page_visited FROM customer_interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, theme_preference, language_preference FROM user_preferences WHERE theme_preference = 'Dark';
SELECT page_visited, COUNT(page_visited) AS total_visits FROM customer_interactions GROUP BY page_visited ORDER BY total_visits DESC;
SELECT user_id, page_visited, interaction_date FROM customer_interactions WHERE page_visited LIKE '%home%' AND interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT customer_id, name, registration_date FROM customers ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interaction_date < CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - INTERVAL '1' DAY;
SELECT customer_id, preference_name, preference_value FROM preferences WHERE preference_name = 'Theme';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM interactions JOIN customers ON interactions.customer_id = customers.customer_id WHERE interactions.interaction_type = 'purchase';
SELECT customer_id, preference_name FROM preferences WHERE preference_value = 'yes';
SELECT name, interaction_type FROM customers JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id WHERE customers.name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT user_id, page_visited, timestamp FROM interactions WHERE page_visited LIKE '%home%';
SELECT user_id, product_id, quantity, order_date FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT order_id, user_id, product_id, quantity FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, price, stock_quantity FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT user_id, page_visited, timestamp FROM interactions WHERE user_id = 2 AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customer_interaction;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM customer_interaction;
SELECT purchase_id, customer_id, purchase_date, total_amount FROM purchases ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, full_name, email, phone_number FROM user_profile WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_id, theme_color, language, notifications_enabled FROM preferences WHERE notifications_enabled = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM user_profile
SELECT customer_id, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM customer_interaction ORDER BY interaction_date DESC
SELECT page_url, view_duration FROM page_views WHERE view_duration > 10 ORDER BY view_duration ASC
SELECT full_name, phone_number, address FROM user_profile WHERE address LIKE '%Street%'
SELECT customer_id, total_amount FROM purchases WHERE total_amount BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY total_amount DESC
